scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && run-p build:**
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && cp public/manifest.json dist/ && cp -r public/assets dist/
scripts.run:brave-mac: web-ext run --target chromium --chromium-binary '/Applications/Brave Browser.app/Contents/MacOS/Brave Browser' --source-dir dist
scripts.run:chrome-mac: web-ext run --target chromium --chromium-binary '/Applications/Google Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google Chrome' --source-dir dist
scripts.start: (sleep 10 && npm run run:firefox) & npm run watch
scripts.start:brave-mac: (sleep 10 && npm run run:brave-mac) & npm run watch
scripts.start:chrome-mac: (sleep 10 && npm run run:chrome-mac) & npm run watch
scripts.start:brave-linux: (sleep 10 && npm run run:brave-linux) & npm run watch
scripts.start:chrome-linux: (sleep 10 && npm run run:chrome-linux) & npm run watch
scripts.start:skip: (sleep 10 && npm run run:firefox) & npm run watchskip
scripts.start:skip-brave-mac: (sleep 10 && npm run run:brave-mac) & npm run watchskip
scripts.start:skip-chrome-mac: (sleep 10 && npm run run:chrome-mac) & npm run watchskip
scripts.start:skip-brave-linux: (sleep 10 && npm run run:brave-linux) & npm run watchskip
scripts.start:skip-chrome-linux: (sleep 10 && npm run run:chrome-linux) & npm run watchskip
scripts.watchskip: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && SKIP_ONBOARDING=true run-p watch:**
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && run-p watch:**
scripts.watch:scripts: NETWORK=regtest parcel watch src/application/inject.ts src/application/background-script.ts src/application/content-script.ts
scripts.watchliquid: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && run-p watchliquid:**
